魶魶魶
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

魶字的基本解释

魶
nà
鲵。
鲸。
海鹞鸟，即“魟”。

魶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nà］
［《廣韻》奴盍切，入盍，泥。］
即鲵。
[②]［nà］
［《廣韻》奴答切，入合，泥。］
鳖之一种。

魶字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魶； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第37
【廣韻】奴盍切【集韻】諾盍切，?音䟜。魚名。似鼈，無甲有尾，口在腹中。【博雅】鯢也。【玉篇】鯨也。【益部方物略】魶魚出溪谷及雅江，有足，能緣木，其聲如兒啼。【史記·司馬相如傳】禺禺鱋魶。【註】徐廣曰：魶，一作鰨。【漢書註】魶，鯷魚也。鯷魚疑鯢魚。

魶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
魶字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
nà
salamander.
whale.
The sea harrier is the "stingray".
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nà］
["Guangyun" Slave cutting, into the 盍, mud. ]
That is salamander.
[②]［nà］
["Guangyun" slave answer cuts, enters together, mud. ]
A kind of turtle.
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魶; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 Page 37
[Guang Yun] Slave cut [Ji Yun] Nuo cut,? Sound. The name of the fish. It resembles a turtle, without a carapace and a tail, with a mouth in the abdomen. [Bo Ya] Salamander also. 【Jade articles】Whales too. 【Yibu Fangwulue】The scorpionfish comes out of the valley and the Yajiang River. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Yu Yu Yi. [Note] Xu Guang said: 魶, a sole. [Hanshu Note] 魶, anchovy also. Anchovy is suspicious of salamander.
Scorpion
